overall.desc: The cloud app works within the Alma menu of a PO line. If the PO line is open, the cloud app is activated by clicking on the title.

footer.paragraph: If the item is later returned, the loan to the next person will occur automatically.

settings.header: 1. First, the settings should be adjusted via the gear menu

list.item1: Entry of all item policy codes for which circulations should be possible
list.item2: Entry of the library code from which the loans are made
list.item3: Entry of the circulation desk code from which the loans are processed
list.item4: Entry of the sender's letterhead for the creation of the circulation slip

area.header: 2. The cloud app has two sections

users.paragraph: Here, you can view and sort the list of circulation participants.

list.item1: The ring/star circulation display depends on whether "RING" or "STAR" is entered in the 5th reporting code.
list.item2: The display of the items in circulation depends on whether a barcode is entered.

circulation.paragraph: Hier kann ein Ring- oder Sternumlauf f√ºr ein konkretes Exemplar gestartet werden.

ring.paragraph: By selecting an item and starting the circulation, a PDF document is generated with the list of circulation participants. The item should be manually checked out, and the loan duration may need to be adjusted if necessary.

star.paragraph: In star circulation, the application creates a reservation for all participants and immediately processes the loan for the first person.

componentFile.saveSuccuss: The settings have been successfully saved
componentFile.saveFailure: The settings could not be saved

alert.noItemPolicy: The item policy list can not be empty

componentFile.selectEntityFailure: An error occurred while retrieving entity data from the Alma API

componentFile.saveUserOrderFailure: The changes could not be saved

alert.searchInAlma: Please navigate to a page in Alma to view a list of entities

alert.noEntity: No entity found. Please navigate to the appropriate page
alert.noSettings: To get started, please visit the Settings page and set your default preferences

alert.changesToSave: There are unsaved changes. Please save them before leaving the page

interestedUsers.desc: The order of users can be changed by dragging and dropping

componentFile.wrongUserOrder: The order of interested users is incompatible to the Alma

componentFile.pdfSuccess: The PDF has been successfully generated
componentFile.pdfFailure: An error occurred while creating the PDF

alert.smallScreen: Please ensure that both the browser and cloud app are in full-screen mode to view the PDF

componentFile.loaned: Circulation can not be started, loaned
componentFile.deleteRequestFailure: An error occurred while deleting request {{requestId}} for user ID: {{userId}}

holdShelf.main: Circulation can not be started, item is reserved
holdShelf.extra: One of the requests might be in the 'Hold Shelf' status and can not be canceled

settings.desc: These values are sourced from your settings. If they appear incorrect, please go to the settings and update them.

componentFile.checkRequestsOrder: Mismatch in the order of registered requests
